RabadonsDeathcap_desc: <tftitemrules>This humble hat can help you make, or unmake, the world itself.</tftitemrules>
9Chempunk_BloodRageMod_desc:
Mod: Gain 35% Attack Speed. The first time you would be reduced to 1 Health, increase the Attack Speed bonus by 100% and heal for 35% maximum Health.

Overcharge: Instead increase the Attack Speed bonus by 200% and heal for 80% maximum Health.
9Chempunk_VirulentBiowareMod_desc:
Mod: For 3 seconds after ability cast, dealing damage applies a plague causing the target and enemies within 1 hex to take 18% more damage for 5 seconds.

Overcharge: Plague duration increases to 10 seconds and plague deals 3.5% of the target's maximum Health per second as magic damage.
9Chempunk_UnstableChemtankMod_desc:
Mod: Gain 30% maximum Health and explode on death, dealing 25% of your maximum Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

Overcharge: Explosion radius is increased to 3 hexes.
TFT9_HeimerUpgrade_HeatRay_desc:
Apex Turret's attacks channel on its target instead, rapidly increasing its damage until the target dies. The damage increases by 2000% every time the Apex Turret would attack.

1 Copy: 100% Attack Damage per tick
2 Copy: 175% Attack Damage per tick
3 Copy: 250% Attack Damage per tick
TFT9_HeimerUpgrade_SelfRepair_desc:
When the Apex Turret would die, it instead becomes untargetable and repairs itself over 7 seconds if Heimerdinger is still alive. The Apex Turret gains bonus Armor and Magic Resist.

1 Count: 10 Armor and Magic Resist
2 Count: 50 Armor and Magic Resist
3 Count: 100 Armor and Magic Resist
TFT9_HeimerUpgrade_Goldification_desc:
Apex Turret's damage executes enemies under 12% Health. Executions have a 100% chance to turn enemies into gold.

1 Count: 1 gold
2 Count: 2 gold
3 Count: 4 gold
9Chempunk_RoboticArmMod_desc:
Mod: Attacks have a 40% chance to trigger 1 additional attack.

Overcharge: Attacks and abilities deal 25% Attack Damage as bonus true damage.
TFT9_HeimerUpgrade_ShrinkRay_desc:
Apex Turret's damage shrinks all enemies hit, Shredding and Sundering them for 4 seconds.

1 Count: 20% Shred and Sunder
2 Count: 30% Shred and Sunder
3 Count: 50% Shred and Sunder

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor
9Chempunk_ChemtankMod_desc:
Mod: Deal 12% more damage. Take 12% less damage. Every 5 seconds, heal for 15% maximum Health.

Overcharge: You are immune to crowd control, and the heal is increased to 25% maximum Health.
TFT9_HeimerUpgrade_MicroRockets_desc:
Apex Turret fires rockets in a wide cone every 3 attacks. Each rocket deals magic damage, Burns, and 33% Wounds for 10 seconds.

1 Count: 50 magic damage; 1% Burn
2 Count: 120 magic damage; 1% Burn
3 Count: 120 magic damage; 2% Burn

Burn: Deal a percentage of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduce healing
9Chempunk_AdaptiveImplantMod_desc:
Mod: While above 50% Health, gain 30% Attack Damage and Ability Power. While below, gain 30% Omnivamp.

Overcharge: Always gain both effects, and their power is increased by 50%.

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt

5NightHarvesterRadiant_desc: Deal <TFTRadiantItemBonus>20%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> bonus damage. After falling below <TFTRadiantItemBonus>80% Health</TFTRadiantItemBonus>, increase this to <TFTRadiantItemBonus>45%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> for the rest of combat.

5GiantSlayerRadiant_desc: Deal <TFTRadiantItemBonus>60%</TFTRadiantItemBonus> more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

5RabadonsDeathcapRadiant_desc: <tftitemrules>It's witnessed - and unleashed - miracles and calamities both.</tftitemrules>

5LeviathanRadiant_desc: After casting an Ability, gain <TFTRadiantItemBonus>60% Attack Speed</TFTRadiantItemBonus> for <TFTRadiantItemBonus>8 seconds</TFTRadiantItemBonus>. Attack Speed is applied after the holder's cast time completes.
